name: GTA5-Mods Forums Dark Theme
description:
Dark theme for forums.gta5-mods.com.

Also works well for admins/moderators (I am a moderator on GTA5-Mods).

For any bug reports or fixes please go to the Git repo: https://gitlab.com/Jitnaught/GTA5ModsForumsDarkTheme
additional_info:
v1.3.4:
    Darkened unread chat rooms in chat list.
v1.3.3:
    Fixed some profile images being completely white.
v1.3.2:
    Fixed mobile navbar when replying to a topic.
v1.3.1:
    Darkened unread notification.
    Fixed more instances of the transparent image problem.
v1.3:
    Darkened all dropdown menus.
    Darkened all textboxs (search textbox included).
    Darkened voters dialog.
    Darkened emoticons dialog.
    Darkened poll dialog.
    Darkened notifications.
    Darkened account info page.
    Darkened notifications page.
    Greenified and darkened the "replied to" button.
v1.2.1:
    Fixed text color of dropdown menus.
v1.2:
    Darkened reply composer.
    Fixed more instances of transparent images.
v1.1.1:
    Actually fixed transparent profile images.
v1.1:
    Fixed transparent profile pictures.
    Darkened horizontal lines and borders.
